==Pre-Election Responses==

The public is indecisive over the amendments. Some think that the amendments are suitable for the time being and that the current situation in Egypt is not perfect for the time to write a new constitution right away. The [[Muslim Brotherhood]] & the [[Salafi]] movement. However others criticized the amendments as not enough are that the new constitution needs to be written now to regulate the process and the requirements for the members of the Parliament.
